thread.title: LOOK: Sexy star Ina Raymundo scores FHM cover for 2nd time
thread.title_full: LOOK: Sexy star Ina Raymundo scores FHM cover for 2nd time

title: LOOK: Sexy star Ina Raymundo scores FHM cover for 2nd time
text:
LOOK: Sexy star Ina Raymundo scores FHM cover for 2nd time INQUIRER.net / 10:59 AM February 28, 2017 A post shared by FHM Philippines (@fhmphilofficial) on Feb 27, 2017 at 6:50am PST ADVERTISEMENT 
Hot mom Ina Raymundo is the newest cover girl of FHM Philippines, landing on the famous men’s magazine’s front page for the second time in two years. 
The magazine revealed on Monday that the sexy actress has blasted its March 2017 and 200th issue as it celebrates 17 years in the magazine industry. 
As an early goody for her loyal fanbase, Raymundo posted an Instagram video of her recent FHM shoot. “For art’s sake, coming out soon,” she captioned her sneak peek . LOOK: Hot mom Ina Raymundo is FHM November cover girl 
Raymundo first sizzled on the pages of FHM in November 2015, also appearing on the magazine’s black-and-white cover. A post shared by Ina Raymundo (@inaraymundo95) on Feb 26, 2017 at 7:25pm PST 
Raymundo, 41, recently starred in a “throwback” commercial for San Miguel Pale Pilsen (SMPP) called “Sabado Nights” alongside Vic Sotto and basketball giants Junemar Fajardo and Marc Pingris. Back in 1995, she was one of the commercial models of the beer brand’s campaign of the same name and this year, she was asked to re-create her iconic advertisement. 
“22 years ago, this San Miguel Pale Pilsen TVC came out,” she narrated in an Instagram post . “It changed my life. I was their second choice for this commercial. But on Day 1 of shooting, the SMPP team felt I was better suited for the ad.” A post shared by Ina Raymundo (@inaraymundo95) on Feb 8, 2017 at 9:28pm PST 
Ramundo, who has five kids with Canadian-Ukranian businessman Brian Poturnak, currently stars in Brillante Mendoza’s drama series “Tsinoy.” Gianna Francesca Catolico /ra RELATED STORIES
